body:
Use this form to request personal information about you held by Her Majesty's Prison and Probation Service that you can't get from your prison.

Submitting a request should take around 5 minutes.

So we can give you the best service, you should be as specific as possible about the information you need.

components.html: We aim to respond to all requests within a month. Do not ask for an update before this point as it may delay your request.

### Before you start 

You will need to provide some personal details to help us find your information  faster: 

* your name
* prison number
* date of birth

The more information you can provide, the quicker we will be able to respond to your request.

Your request is protected by the Data Protection Act which means any information you receive is confidential and nobody else will see it.

We will only send information once so you may wish to consider sharing it with your solicitor.

**We can only send your information to you. If you want your information to be sent to someone else, such as your solicitor or a relative, they will need to submit a request on your behalf with your signed authority.**
